#include<stdio.h>
#define PUTCHAR putchar_unlocked
inline void out(int x)
{
if(x==-1)
{
PUTCHAR('-');
PUTCHAR('1');
PUTCHAR('\n');
}
else
{
int i = 10;
char buf[11];
// buf[10] = 0;
buf[10] = '\n';

do
{
buf[--i] = x % 10 + '0';
x/= 10;
}while(x);
do
{
PUTCHAR(buf[i]);
} while (buf[i++] != '\n');
}
}
inline int inp()
{
int noRead=0;
char p=getchar_unlocked();
for(;p<33;)
{
p=getchar_unlocked();
};
while(p>32)
{
noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
p=getchar_unlocked();
}
return noRead;
}

int main()
{
int n,q,tem,i,j,x,y,count;
n=inp();q=inp();
int a[10001][101]={{}};
for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
{
	tem=inp();
	for(j=1;j<101;j++)
		a[i][j]=a[i-1][j];
	a[i][tem]++;
}
while(q--)
{
	count=0;
	x=inp();y=inp();
	for(j=1;j<101;j++)	
		if(a[y][j]-a[x-1][j]>0)count++;
	out(count);
}
return 0;
}
